channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Voice of America director says Trump officials are illegally ousting him
item.description: A judge is demanding answers about the international broadcaster's future from Trump official Kari Lake.

item.title: Nihilistic online networks groom minors to commit harm. Her son was one of them

item.title: 60 years later, Voting Rights Act protections for minority voters face new threats
item.description: Sixty years after the Voting Rights Act became a landmark law against racial discrimination, legal challenges heading to the Supreme Court could curta...

item.title: It's 2025, the year we decided we need a widespread slur for robots
item.description: People all over TikTok and Instagram are using the word "clanker" as a catch-all for robots and AI. Here's a deep dive into the origins of the pejorat...

item.title: AI companies are targeting students. Here's how that's changing studying
item.description: Students are increasingly using AI tools to help with — and do — their homework. Here's how older online study services, students and professors are a...

item.title: Medical transport plane crash kills all 4 on board in Navajo Nation in Arizona
item.description: A small medical transport plane crashed and caught fire Tuesday on the Navajo Nation in northern Arizona, killing all four people on board, the tribe ...

item.title: Oceangate's Titan whistleblower: 'People were sold a lie'
item.description: A former Oceangate employee says he told US authorities about safety concerns with the sub before it imploded.

item.title: Texas governor seeks court order to fire top Democrat who fled in row over voting map
item.description: "There must be consequences," says the governor as Democrats insist they will not return to Texas.

item.description: Screen time doesn't just affect mental health​. It may also take a toll on physical health, according to new research focused on heart health in child...

item.title: 8/5: CBS Evening News
item.description: 2024 crime down in every category, FBI reports; Chatbots turned to for companionship

item.title: Clintons subpoenaed to testify in congressional Epstein investigation
item.description: Former top officials from the justice department during the Obama, Trump and Biden administrations were also sent subpoenas.

item.title: As Trump cracks down on college student visas, other countries see opportunity
item.description: As part of its crackdown on immigration, President Donald Trump’s administration is pressuring U.S. colleges to reduce their dependence on internation...

item.title: Russian attacks on Ukraine double since Trump inauguration
item.description: Missile and drone attacks on Ukraine are now at their highest, despite Trump's promise to end the war.

item.title: Trump-backed candidate becomes Polish president
item.description: Conservative Karol Nawrocki was inaugurated Wednesday as Poland 's new president, which could set the country on a more nationalist course.

item.title: UN official says Israel expanding Gaza operations would risk 'catastrophic consequences'
item.description: The UN's assistant secretary general says reports of the possible move are "deeply alarming".

item.title: Putin, Trump envoy Witkoff meet ahead of Trump Ukraine war accord deadline
item.description: The Russian president and Trump emissary held talks in Moscow days before the White House deadline for Russia to reach a peace deal with Ukraine.

item.title: Texas governor asks court to remove House Democratic leader from office over walkout
Trump’s redistricting fight could broaden and last a while with Texas and California as epicenters
